subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Chants of “We want Steph” could be heard during the Knicks’ victory against the Charlotte Bobcats Wednesday night, but point guard Chris Duhon will continue to run the show.
snippet: Chants of “We want Steph” could be heard during the Knicks’ victory against the Charlotte Bobcats Wednesday night, but point guard Chris Duhon will continue to run the show.
